pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assessing Surrogacy with a Censored Outcome // Identifies the optimal transformation of a surrogate marker and estimates the proportion of treatment explained (PTE) by the optimally- transformed surrogate at an earlier time point when the primary outcome of interest is a censored time-to-event outcome; details are described in Wang et al (2021) doi:10.1002/sim.9185.
